#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define vl vector<ll>
int main() {
	ll t, n, k, i, cnt,cal,num,l,r;
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin >> t;
	while( t--)
	{
	    cin >> n >> k;
	    vl sum(n+1);
	    cal=0;
	    for( i=1; i<=n; i++)
	    {
	        cin >> num;
	        cal += num;
	        sum[i] = cal;
	    }
	    l = r = 1;
	    cnt = 0;
	    while(l <= n)
	    {
	        if(sum[r] - sum[l-1] == k)
	        {
	            cnt++;
	            r++;
	            l=r;
	        }
	        else if((sum[r] - sum[l-1] < k)&&(r < n))
	        {
	            if(r < n)
	            {
	                r++;
	            }
	        }
	        else
	        {
	            l++;
	        }
	    }
	    cout << cnt << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
